offset - Variable in class osyfe.graphic.Model.Bone
The mesh to bone space transformation.
open() - Method in class osyfe.gui.Window
Opens this window.
open(Overlay) - Static method in class osyfe.Screen
Opens the game window, adds the given overlay to it and starts the game loop.

Manages the OpenAL context and the listener in 3D-space.

An option widget.

osyfe - package osyfe
Welcome to the Osyfe Game Library.
osyfe.audio - package osyfe.audio
Audio handling.
osyfe.data - package osyfe.data
Provides resource data access and a data streaming library.
osyfe.graphic - package osyfe.graphic
Manages graphical OpenGL objects.
osyfe.graphic.util - package osyfe.graphic.util
Contains graphics utilities such as cameras, text rendering and basic shape generation.
osyfe.gui - package osyfe.gui
Provides standard gui elements with automatic input handling and rendering.
osyfe.net - package osyfe.net
Offers a very basic networking API for sending DMaps via TCP.
osyfe.tool - package osyfe.tool
Provides some development tools:
- A model reader and converter.
Overlay - Interface in osyfe
Interface for game overlays which can be added to the Screen class.
